body.name: Silicon Power 2 Pack 128GB USB 3.0/3.1 Gen1 USB Flash Drive Blaze B02

byLineInfo.name: Visit the SP Silicon Power Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Plug and play, and it's compatible with Windows 10/8.1/8/7/Vista/XP, Mac OS 10.3.x or later, Linux 2.6.x or late
Backed by a 5 years warranty to promise complete services and technical support.
body.description: SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Interface The Blaze B02 delivers transfer rates of up to 5GB/s. 10 times faster than a USB 2.0. flash drive, it saves you precious time even when handling large files such as graphics and HD videos. Speed and Good Looks The Blaze B02 is not only fast, but also got the looks. Featuring a stylish black casing that reminds of hairline finished steel, this flash drive is a real show off. Compact Size and Easy to Bring The Blaze B02 comes with a strap hole to make it easily attachable to key rings or bags. And thanks to its compact size, it will never be in your way. Guaranteed Quality & 5-years Warranty Backed by 5-years warranty, the Blaze B02 comes with complete service and technical support. Box Contains 2 x Silicon Power 128GB Blaze B02 USB3.0 Flash Drive

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 7,291 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work properly
reviews.reviewText: There is not much to be said for these. They hold as much data as promised. They are not high speed. But they are fast enough to load videos on and watch through my TV. Which is fast enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large storage for small amount of money
reviews.reviewText: The Silicon Power 2 Pack 128GB USB Flash Drive Blaze B02 offers an attractive combination of ample storage capacity and affordability. Here's a quick breakdown:Pros:1. **Large Storage Capacity**: With 128GB per flash drive, you have plenty of space for storing documents, media files, and backups.2. **USB 3.0/3.1 Gen1**: The USB 3.0/3.1 Gen1 interface ensures fast data transfer speeds, making it convenient for quick file transfers.3. **Value for Money**: If you obtained these drives at a low price, they provide excellent value for the storage capacity they offer.4. **Two-Pack**: The inclusion of two drives in the pack adds versatility, allowing for redundancy or different usage scenarios.Cons:1. **Build Quality**: Lower-priced USB drives may not be as robust as higher-end options, so handle them with care to ensure longevity.2. **Speed Variation**: Keep in mind that real-world data transfer speeds can vary based on your computer's specifications and usage.Overall, the Silicon Power 2 Pack 128GB USB Flash Drive Blaze B02 is a cost-effective choice for those seeking high-capacity storage with reasonable performance. Enjoy your expanded storage space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and reliable
reviews.reviewText: I bought these so that play recorded movies on a smart tv without having a portable drive connected. I was concerned that this might not be fast enough to stream video, but it is working great. Depending on video quality and length, you can store anywhere from 30-100 movies on a stick. Yes, it’s a wide range, but there are a lot of variables for movie size.Overall I’m really pleased with these and use them all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars FAT32 Filesystem can limit storage - but it is not the USB drive's fault
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: All my problems were related to the fact that Windows Format will not create FAT32 volumes bigger than 32GB. These USB drives come formatted as 128GB FAT32 - however as soon as you (or the Windows Recovery Media Utility) reformat them, the storage is limited to a 32GB FAT32 volume.I retested my USB drives. I re-formatted them as exFAT drives and they work as advertised.If you ever want to re-format a usb drive as a FAT32 larger than 32GB (like the way these come from the factory), you'll need to buy or find a free 3rd party format utility that will do large FAT32 volumes.I upgraded my rating to 4 stars; they are not 5-star drives because they are a bit slow (but they work as advertised).[Original Review]I had issues with the two I ordered not being able to store more than 32 of the promised 128GB of data.The first drive was used by the Windows "Create Recovery Media" tool. The tool formatted the USB drive, then had errors writing the recovery drive media. Looking at the USB drive afterwards it was formatted as a 32GB drive. I tried re-formatting several times - but it never showed more than 32GB capacity.I tested the second USB drive. It appeared to have the 128GB capacity when viewed with windows explorer. However, when I started copying a lot of data to the drive, it started having errors after I had copied approximately 32GB of data to it.Both of these USB drives had the promised 128GB printed on the drive. Seems fishy to me. They have lost my trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Plugin Storage
reviews.reviewText: Works great without any issues. Very good value for what you get. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the job!
reviews.reviewText: These things are great. I put music on them to play in the car. I've got over sixty five hundred songs on this thing and it's still got plenty of room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast USB thumb drive. Good size for backing up a freshly installed C: drive.
reviews.reviewText: Looking into eventually upgrading(?) from Win 10 to Win 11. Backup on Win 11 wants to put the backups in the cloud using Microsoft's OneDrive. No thanks. I need to investigate 3rd party backup programs but just to get a size idea, a XCOPY of C: to the thumb drive left plenty of room (didn't copy Documents or Pictures - they each went to the other 2 thumb drives from this three pack). Not ideal since these won't boot or restore C: if it gets clobbered, but this looks like a viable avenue to investigate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars USB flash drive pack
reviews.reviewText: Great value and these hold many photos, videos of family events. Would buy again!
Small and high capacity. Speeds are not the fastest but it's a pretty cheap drive for what you get. Working great no issues.
Will be buying more. Can't go wrong for this price!

reviews.reviewTitle: a1 great product for the price
